alluxio.worker.file

Class UnderFileSystemManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.worker.file.UnderFileSystemManager

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class UnderFileSystemManager
extends Object
    Handles writes to the under file system. Manages open output streams to Under File Systems. Individual streams should only be used by one client. Each instance keeps its own state of temporary file ids to open streams.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnderFileSystemManager()
      Creates a new under file system manager.

    • Method Summary

      Closes an open input stream associated with the given temporary ufs file id.

      Completes an open stream associated with the given worker file id.
      long createFile(long sessionId, AlluxioURI ufsUri, Permission perm)
      Creates a OutputStreamAgent for the given file path and adds it to the open streams map keyed with the returned worker file id.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnderFileSystemManager

        public UnderFileSystemManager()
        Creates a new under file system manager. Stream ids are unique to each under file system manager.

    • Method Detail

      • createFile

        public long createFile(long sessionId,
                       AlluxioURI ufsUri,
                       Permission perm)
                throws FileAlreadyExistsException,
                       IOException
        Creates a OutputStreamAgent for the given file path and adds it to the open streams map keyed with the returned worker file id.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        ufsUri - the path to create in the under file system
        perm - the permission for the file to be created
        Returns:
        the worker file id which should be used to reference the open stream
        Throws:
        FileAlreadyExistsException - if the under file system path already exists
        IOException - if an error occurs when operating on the under file system

      • cancelFile

        public void cancelFile(long sessionId,
                       long tempUfsFileId)
                throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                       IOException
        Cancels the open stream associated with the given worker file id. This will close the open stream.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        tempUfsFileId - the worker id referencing an open file in the under file system
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the worker file id is not valid
        IOException - if an error occurs when operating on the under file system

      • cleanupSession

        public void cleanupSession(long sessionId)
        Cleans up the state of the given session id.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id to clean up

      • closeFile

        public void closeFile(long sessionId,
                      long tempUfsFileId)
               throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                      IOException
        Closes an open input stream associated with the given temporary ufs file id. The temporary ufs file id will be invalid after this is called.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        tempUfsFileId - the temporary ufs file id
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the worker is not reading the specified file
        IOException - if an error occurs when operating on the under file system

      • completeFile

        public long completeFile(long sessionId,
                         long tempUfsFileId,
                         Permission perm)
                  throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                         IOException
        Completes an open stream associated with the given worker file id. This will close the open stream.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        tempUfsFileId - the worker id referencing an open file in the under file system
        perm - the permission of the file
        Returns:
        the length of the completed file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the worker file id is not valid
        IOException - if an error occurs when operating on the under file system

      • getInputStreamAtPosition

        public InputStream getInputStreamAtPosition(long tempUfsFileId,
                                            long position)
                                     throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                                            IOException
        Parameters:
        tempUfsFileId - the temporary ufs file id
        position - the absolute position in the file to start the stream at
        Returns:
        the input stream to read from this file, null if the position is past the end of the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the worker file id not valid
        IOException - if an error occurs when operating on the under file system

      • getOutputStream

        public OutputStream getOutputStream(long tempUfsFileId)
                             throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Parameters:
        tempUfsFileId - the temporary ufs file id
        Returns:
        the output stream to write to this file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the worker file id not valid

      • openFile

        public long openFile(long sessionId,
                     AlluxioURI ufsUri)
              throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                     IOException
        Opens a file from the under file system and associates it with a worker file id.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        ufsUri - the path to create in the under file system
        Returns:
        the worker file id which should be used to reference the open stream
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist in the under file system
        IOException - if an error occurs when operating on the under file system
